title: Use fixed initial condition in sequence GPU sweep
description: Switch Rossler sequence GPU sweep to fixed initial conditions (with env override) and run once.
close_reason: Set sequence GPU sweep to fixed initial condition by default (with env override) and ran sweep.

title: Clean up stray Manifest and add minimal tests
description: Remove scans/rossler/Manifest.toml and add test/runtests.jl so Pkg.test has a target.
close_reason: Added new GPU sweep for random sequence colors.

title: Add random-sequence GPU sweep
description: Create a new Rossler GPU sweep that colors each distinct binary sequence with a random color.
close_reason: Added new GPU sweep that maps each unique binary sequence to a random color.

title: Fix Project.toml metadata
description: Add required name/uuid fields to root Project.toml so Pkg.test works. Note untracked manifests in subdirs.
close_reason: Added name/uuid metadata to Project.toml; Pkg.test now runs but fails due to missing test/runtests.jl.

title: Fix RGB color construction in sequence GPU sweep
description: Use RGB{Float32} instead of RGBf0 to avoid undefined symbol.
close_reason: Updated sequence GPU sweep to use RGB{Float32} colormap entries.

title: Switch Rossler sweep to power-series encoding with random colors
description: Replace LZ complexity heatmap output with power-series sum-of-bits value mapped to random colormap for Rossler sweeps (GPU/CPU).
close_reason: Implemented power-series sweep outputs for Rossler GPU/CPU. Pkg.test failed (Project.toml lacks name/UUID).
